verses.roman:
prabhura samācāra śuni' kulīna-grāma-vāsī
satyarāja-rāmānanda mililā sabe āsi'

synonyms: prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; samācāra—news; śuni'—hearing; kulīna-grāma-vāsī—the inhabitants of Kulīna-grāma; satyarāja—Satyarāja; rāmānanda—Rāmānanda; mililā—met; sabe—all; āsi'—coming.
translation: The inhabitants of Kulīna-grāma-Satyarāja, Rāmānanda and all the other devotees there-came and joined Advaita Ācārya.
